x.Q12916: real number (quantity along a continuous line)

y.Q12916: real number (quantity along a continuous line)

n.Q21199: natural number (numbers used for counting and ordering)

k.Q21199: natural number (numbers used for counting and ordering)

title: Binomial_theorem
